definition: any of several plants of the genus Manihot having fleshy roots yielding a nutritious starch
details:
noun
- any of several plants of the genus Manihot having fleshy roots yielding a nutritious starch
= synonyms: casava
- cassava root eaten as a staple food after drying and leaching
= synonyms: manioc
- a starch made by leaching and drying the root of the cassava plant
= synonyms: manioc, cassava starch, manioca
